title: Lock screen Pixel 4 issues (Android 11)
content:
I have Pixel 4 and after updating to Android 11 i have these issues:
- tap to turn on screen some times not working
- Face Unlock sometimes also not working, need to restart device
-On unlocked phone sometimes is not working the swipe in the lockscreen.
-Rotate many times not working, or sometimes working only on landscape mode.
